com.dhemery.configuring
Class LoadProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.dhemery.configuring.LoadProperties

public class LoadProperties
extends Object

Static utility methods to load properties from property files and resources.

Constructor Detail

LoadProperties

public LoadProperties()
Method Detail

propertiesFromFile

public static Properties propertiesFromFile(String fileName)
Load properties from a properties file.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the properties file to load
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if the properties file does not exist or an IO exception occurs while loading properties

propertiesFromFiles

public static Properties propertiesFromFiles(String... fileNames)
Load properties from properties files in the order that the file names are listed. If multiple files define a property, the value loaded last is retained.

Parameters:
fileNames - the names of the properties files to load
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if a properties file does not exist or an IO exception occurs while loading properties

propertiesFromResource

public static Properties propertiesFromResource(String resourceName)
Load properties from a properties resources.

The resource name must be an absolute name. That is, it must start with a / character.

Parameters:
resourceName - the name of the properties resource to load
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if the properties resource does not exist or an IO exception occurs while loading properties

propertiesFromResources

public static Properties propertiesFromResources(String... resourceNames)
Load properties from properties resources in the order that the resource names are listed. If multiple resources define a property, the value loaded last is retained.

Each resource name must be an absolute name. That is, it must start with a / character.

Parameters:
resourceNames - the names of the properties resources to load
Throws:
ConfigurationException - if a properties resource does not exist or an IO exception occurs while loading properties
